info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 23102
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;benefriches.ademe.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 23102
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;benefriches.ademe.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
benefriches.ademe.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	benefriches-production.osc-secnum-fr1.scalingo.io.
benefriches-production.osc-secnum-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-secnum-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2349431265 10000 2400 604800 1800

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: benefriches.ademe.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 150 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 18 Aug 2024 03:19:19 GMT Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Request-Id: f0672186-f79d-42f1-8a70-6bb2dd208859 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: benefriches.ademe.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://benefriches.ademe.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
